Inter-District Transfer

Move Your Car.
Without Moving Yourself.

Need your car brought from your hometown to Chennai? Or sending it back? We pick it up, drive it safely, and deliver it to your doorstep.

How It Works

Professional logistics for your personal vehicle.

1

Driver Dispatch

We send a verified driver by Bus/Train to the pickup city (e.g., Coimbatore/Madurai).

2

Video Inspection

Before starting, the driver does a live video call to record scratches, dents, and fuel levels.

3

The Drive

Live location sharing on WhatsApp. Safe driving speed (Max 90kmph) maintained throughout.

4

Doorstep Delivery

Car is delivered to your destination. Final inspection and key handover.

Experienced, verified, and multilingual drivers at your service.

Frequently Asked Questions

We send the driver via Bus or Train to the city where your car is located. You will need to reimburse this travel ticket cost (actuals) along with the driving charges.

Have Questions? Let's Chat!

Get instant answers about our services, pricing, or custom requirements. Our team is ready to help you find the perfect transport solution.
